fields.name: service_id
fields.title: Service ID
fields.description: Contains an ID that uniquely identifies a set of dates when service is available for one or more routes. Each service_id value can appear at most once in a calendar.txt file. This value is dataset unique. It is referenced by the trips.txt file.

fields.name: monday
fields.title: Monday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Mondays.

fields.name: tuesday
fields.title: Tuesday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Tuesdays.

fields.name: wednesday
fields.title: Wednesday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Wednesdays.

fields.name: thursday
fields.title: Thursday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Thursdays.

fields.name: friday
fields.title: Friday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Fridays.

fields.name: saturday
fields.title: Saturday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Saturdays.

fields.name: sunday
fields.title: Sunday
fields.description: Contains a binary value that indicates whether the service is valid for all Sundays.

fields.name: start_date
fields.title: Start Date
fields.description: The start_date field contains the start date for the service.  The start_date field's value should be in YYYYMMDD format.

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: End Date
fields.description: Contains the end date for the service. This date is included in the service interval.  The end_date field's value should be in YYYYMMDD format.
